      • filterResources

        public void filterResources(com.mongodb.MongoClient client)
        Crawls through URL-Resources and fills a new collection with all resources that could be HTML
        Parameters:
        client - MongoDB Client

      • crawlResources

        public void crawlResources(com.mongodb.MongoClient client)
        Rebuilds the manager after a number of resources. If a manager gets stuck it hits its timeout and a new one gets build for the next step
        Parameters:
        client - MongoDB Client

      • gatherData

        public org.json.JSONArray gatherData(com.mongodb.MongoClient client)
        Runs MongoDB Queries to get the desired data and returns them in a JSONArray as follows: [0]: General Metadata [1]: Numbers of Archive-Files [2]: Numbers of RDF-Files
        Parameters:
        client - MongoDB Client
        Returns:
        JSONArray

      • run

        public org.json.JSONArray run(java.lang.String pathToConfig,
                              boolean filter)
        Full Run of the Tool. Filtering, Craling and gathering the Data. Returns JSONArray with this data: [0]: General Metadata [1]: Numbers of Archive-Files [2]: Numbers of RDF-Files
        Parameters:
        pathToConfig - Path to the Config File
        filter - set to false if you want to reuse an old filtered_data collection
